title: Episode 26: James Bond, the Rolling Stones, and Podcast Politics!
description: Happy Anniversary! James Bond is 50, and so are the Rolling Stones! A conversation about whether or not the gang should address politics on the podcast turns into a thoughtful discussion about the relationship between Christians and democracy surrounding abortion and other issues. This week on the podcast!

This week on the podcast!
